Author: StrangerFew2424

Comment: Trump supporters just think fast action means he's "getting stuff done" and they don't care at all about what the actions are nor have the interest and objectivity to actually research it beyond the dopamine rush bubble they're in from being lied to by Fox News telling then what they want to hear.   Action does not mean good. It takes slow methodical thoughtful care to build services, policies, institutions, and laws that benefit the greater whole of society.   Anyone can take a wrecking ball to it quickly. Sure, that's change. That doesn't mean it was at all good change.
Author: JournalistRecent1230

Comment: General theme of the article is that Trump’s actions have not been helpful to them, but they all support Trump. They didn’t support Harris and/or wanted a change from the status quo. Which echos that the Democratic Party needs to change its tactics if it wants to win.  The sad part is how they are deluding themselves. “I was frustrated that my food was taking too long to cook, so I rushed it, and now my food is burnt. But at least I have my food, which was better than waiting!”
Author: Initial-Toe-9512
